code: import React from'react';import{KNOWLEDGE_DATA}from'../utils/mockResults';import'./KnowledgeCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const KnowledgeCard=_ref=>{let{topic}=_ref;const data=KNOWLEDGE_DATA[topic.toLowerCase()];if(!data)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"knowledge-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"kc-title",children:data.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"kc-type",children:data.type}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"kc-description",children:data.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"kc-facts",children:data.facts.map((fact,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"kc-fact",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"kc-fact-label",children:fact.label}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"kc-fact-value",children:fact.value})]},index))})]});};export default KnowledgeCard;
